BugInstance.message: Non derivable method org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.database.mysql.MySQLDataTypeLoader.load() declares throwing an exception that isn't thrown
This use of java/sql/Connection.prepareStatement(Ljava/lang/String;)Ljava/sql/PreparedStatement; can be vulnerable to SQL injection (with JDBC)
